## ComputeService.getJob() method

Read Job Get information about a job running on NERSC compute resources.

- \*\*machine\*\*: the NERSC compute resource - \*\*jobid\*\*: the id of the job - \*\*sacct\*\*: (optional) if true, use `sacct` otherwise `squeue` to get the job info

**Signature:**

```typescript
getJob(machine: PublicHost, jobid: string, sacct?: boolean): CancelablePromise<JobOutput>;
```
